dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3677 IH: Executive Order 14292 Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett (for himself and Mrs. Luna) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14292 relating to Improving the Safety and Security of Biological Research.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Executive Order 14292 Act of 2025.
Executive Order 14292 (relating to Improving the Safety and Security of Biological Research (signed on May 5, 2025)) shall have the force and effect of law.
